recipesJson.name: Shut the F@¢k up!
recipesJson.author: KylezKloudz
recipesJson.description: Simple coffee and cream... I'm an avid coffee lover and coffee vapes seem to be on the difficult side to nail down... Just wanted to make this nice and simple, 1st version, should be nice and creamy once steeped...

reviews.text: Simple but good after a long steep,thx
